item.description: https://railway.app - Railway is an infrastructure platform where you can provision infrastructure, develop with that infrastructure locally, and then deploy to the cloud. 3 Projects, 2 Plugins / Project, 2 Environments / Project, 3 Live Deploys / Environment available for free.

item.title: Adding Forms backend provider - herotofu.com
item.description: https://herotofu.com/ - Forms backend with bot detection and encrypted archive. Forward submissions via UI to email, Slack, or Zapier. Use your own frontend, no server code required. Free plan gives unlimited forms and 50 submissions per month.
